glsa.title: Mednafen: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: An unspecified vulnerability in Mednafen could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Mednafen is an advanced NES, GB/GBC/GBA, TurboGrafx 16/CD, NGPC and Lynx emulator.

description.p: An unspecified vulnerability has been discovered in Mednafen when using network play.

impact.p: A remote server could execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Mednafen users should upgrade to the latest version:
